lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It will protect you against anyone who comes down here. Just hold it up and it will chase away any demons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He was the first one out of the light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but everyone else is still in the shadow, all these voices coming at her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can see me because I went down towards Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She steps a little closer to you as you're holding the whip out, and she grabs your hand with her left hand and kind of pulls it in and goes, "Please. Don't leave me here. I can fend "for my own. Just don't leave me here."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I step forward now behind Scanlan. Super fucking intimidating. If things go well upstairs, we'll be back. If when we leave, you make a peep, you won't ever again.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll intimidation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She shrinks back. She still hasn't looked away from you, and she kind of looks at you for a second and (heavy sigh) sits down, frustrated, at the bottom of the cell and just, "Then go. Leave "me. Useless."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) Let's check the other side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eat that lembas bread.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was it a magical whip or just a rope?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it was just his whip.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's check the other side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No no no, there's something, I don't know what, I couldn't make out what I was hearing, it sounded like hay or grass moving, so I don't want to mess with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're the worst.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the second room?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is where I heard something before.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And my perception. Vex, come up here and look around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sneak up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't see anything, but I feel like something's here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we sense anything?

lines.text: By the way, how long has this all taken?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since you left the symbol up there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The tunnel, left the lady, the tunnel. Since we've incited the rebellion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus. We've got to start cooking, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike, do you, is there anything here, do you sense anything in this room?

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Me, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so there was dungeon and dungeon, set of cells and set of cells, but you said--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there is, past her cells, a--

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: We're not getting to see it yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now that you've been through this whole thing, you can see now--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ta-da!

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should let her out.

lines.text: Yeah, we gave her food and water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She scrabbled at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She brought it to her, but she didn't eat it immediately, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because she's not hungry, because she hasn't been in there for a while.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We didn't see her eat it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there, do we see anyone else in any of the cells?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At this point, I grab my sister and I say, Come on, we're going to check the cells. And we look at every single one of them.

lines.text: Okay, you go through every cell. There is nobody living in them. You do see a few of the cells have long-decomposed corpses. Piles of bones, mostly picked clean by the rats or whatever creatures live in here. But from your best knowledge of decomposition through your experiences, nothing fresher than like the past year, maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk back up to the old woman. Not hungry or thirsty, I take it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to go with Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay. She goes, "I was fed naught but this morning, I have to make this last."

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. But if you eat it all at once, you have nothing to keep you over until the next time."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, have a little nibble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you a strange look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have a little nibble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes some of the rations and breaks it off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's not the finest of stone fish, but it'll do."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cooking with Grog! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Old people love us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're just the worst to old people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why are you so spiteful, giant man?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I don't trust you, old woman.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.text: Could I ask what for?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Could I ask what for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a great idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, your form here is incorporeal, there is no blood flow from your current body.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck. I just want to see if she's a vampire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In Vasselheim there is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back in Vasselheim there is, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, Grog, maybe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, do you get any ideas watching her do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I fucking bite into the meat of my hand because I see what she's trying to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just (chomp).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's wrong with you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right here. On tap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She turns her head curiously and looks disgusted and disturbed by this display.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very confused.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Clean blood. Feel yourself tempted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know not which madness has taken you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're making asses of ourselves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please. Please, I implore you, just open these gates. Let me fare for my own fate."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, the answer to that is no. We'll be back, I'm going to go creep up the stairs.

lines.text: "She. You. You, please."

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You turn it this way. You don't have the proper tools for this--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I snap the thing into the lock. Oh no. I knew I shouldn't have done that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Foolish girl!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just don't know what I'm doing, but I will be back with someone who does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perception?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Perception?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit, because she's going to turn into something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's really good. 26.

lines.text: 26. When she went up and grabbed the lock with you, her hands grabbed the lock. You only felt one hand.

lines.text: Oh my god, it's Ripley! Oh my god, it's Ripley! Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The worst.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.text: Wait, who's Ripley? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we're stopping.

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: My pick up is at 5AM.

lines.text: Oh my god, Ashley.

lines.text: It's one, no, 2AM there.

lines.text: It's almost 2AM.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley!

lines.text: I know. Well thank you, Ashley, for joining us. Thank you so much. Really appreciate it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah, shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley, we love you.

lines.text: All right, I love you guys so much.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Bye!

lines.text: Can that astral connection hold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you guys, thank you so much for coming and watching our craziness every week. Once again, blown away by the generosity of all the Critters and folk from our Critmas last week. That episode will be up tomorrow, and for those who didn't get a chance to see the ridiculous generosity and absurdity that is you guys in all of your amazement, check it out. And thank you for giving to charity, thank you for everything you guys do, and thank you for watching us be silly and rolling dice every week.

lines.text: And yeah, go check out all of our playlists.
